mapper.update:
update RAC_USER
NICKNAME = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AVATAR = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_PSWD = #{loginPswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_PSWD = #{payPswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALT = #{salt,jdbcType=CHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_VERIFIED_MOBILE = #{isVerifiedMobile,jdbcType=BIT},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_VERIFIED_EMAIL = #{isVerifiedEmail,jdbcType=BIT},
WX_OPEN_ID = #{wxOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WX_UNION_ID = #{wxUnionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WX_NICKNAME = #{wxNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WX_AVATAR = #{wxAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QQ_OPEN_ID = #{qqOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QQ_UNION_ID = #{qqUnionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QQ_NICKNAME = #{qqNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QQ_AVATAR = #{qqAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REAL_NAME = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_VERIFIED_REALNAME = #{isVerifiedRealname,jdbcType=BIT},
ID_CARD = #{idCard,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_VERIFIED_IDCARD = #{isVerifiedIdcard,jdbcType=BIT},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
AGE = #{age,jdbcType=TINYINT},
IS_TESTER = #{isTester,jdbcType=BIT},
IS_ENABLED = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=BIT},
MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP = #{modifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update RAC_USER set NICKNAME = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AVATAR = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_PSWD = #{loginPswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_PSWD = #{payPswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALT = #{salt,jdbcType=CHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_VERIFIED_MOBILE = #{isVerifiedMobile,jdbcType=BIT}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_VERIFIED_EMAIL = #{isVerifiedEmail,jdbcType=BIT}, WX_OPEN_ID = #{wxOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WX_UNION_ID = #{wxUnionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WX_NICKNAME = #{wxNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WX_AVATAR = #{wxAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQ_OPEN_ID = #{qqOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQ_UNION_ID = #{qqUnionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQ_NICKNAME = #{qqNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQ_AVATAR = #{qqAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REAL_NAME = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_VERIFIED_REALNAME = #{isVerifiedRealname,jdbcType=BIT}, ID_CARD = #{idCard,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_VERIFIED_IDCARD = #{isVerifiedIdcard,jdbcType=BIT}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, AGE = #{age,jdbcType=TINYINT}, IS_TESTER = #{isTester,jdbcType=BIT}, IS_ENABLED = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=BIT}, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP = #{modifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, NICKNAME, AVATAR, LOGIN_NAME, LOGIN_PSWD, PAY_PSWD, SALT, MOBILE, IS_VERIFIED_MOBILE, EMAIL, IS_VERIFIED_EMAIL, WX_OPEN_ID, WX_UNION_ID, WX_NICKNAME, WX_AVATAR, QQ_OPEN_ID, QQ_UNION_ID, QQ_NICKNAME, QQ_AVATAR, REAL_NAME, IS_VERIFIED_REALNAME, ID_CARD, IS_VERIFIED_IDCARD, SEX, AGE, IS_TESTER, IS_ENABLED, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP from RAC_USER
